Reference

All functions

drdid()

Doubly Robust Difference-in-Differences Estimators for the ATT

drdid_imp_panel()

Improved Doubly Robust Difference-in-Differences Estimator for the ATT, with Panel Data

drdid_imp_rc()

'Improved' and locally efficient Doubly Robust Difference-in-Differences Estimator for the ATT, with Repeated Cross Section Data

drdid_imp_rc1()

'Improved' Doubly Robust Difference-in-Differences Estimator for the ATT, with Repeated Cross Section Data

drdid_panel()

'Traditional' Doubly Robust Difference-in-Differences Estimator for the ATT, with Panel Data

drdid_rc()

Locally Efficient Doubly Robust Difference-in-Differences Estimator for the ATT, with Repeated Cross Section Data

drdid_rc1()

'Traditional' Doubly Robust Difference-in-Differences Estimator for the ATT, with Repeated Cross Section Data

ipwdid()

Inverse Probability Weighted Difference-in-Differences Estimators for the ATT

ipw_did_panel()

Abadie's inverse probability weighted Difference-in-Differences Estimator with Panel Data

ipw_did_rc()

Inverse probability weighted Difference-in-Differences Estimator with Repeated Cross Section Data

nsw

National Supported Work Demonstration Dataset

nsw_long

National Supported Work Demonstration Dataset in Long format

ordid()

Outcome Regression Difference-in-Differences Estimators for the ATT

reg_did_panel()

Regression-based DID estimator with Panel Data Regression-based Difference-in-Differences Estimator for the ATT, with Panel Data

reg_did_rc()

Regression-based DID estimator with Repeated Cross Section Data Regression-based Difference-in-Differences Estimator for the ATT, with Repeated Cross Section Data

sim_rc

Simulated Repeated Cross-Section Data

std_ipw_did_panel()

Standardized Inverse probability weighted Difference-in-Differences Estimator with Panel Data

std_ipw_did_rc()
